title: What is the profit percentage if a boy takes 10 mangoes for 15 and sold 8 mangoes at 25 rupees? - Quora

response.answer_text: 10 mangoes-> 15/- So each mango 1.5/- . This is cost price 8 mangoes -> 25/- So each mango 3.125. This is selling price Profit = sp-cp=3.125–1.5=1.625 Profit%=( profit/cp) *100= 1.625*100/1.5 =108.3% Hope this helps you!!

cost price of 10 mangoes = 15 cost price of 1 mango = 15/10=1.5 cost price of 8 mangoes= 1.5 x 8 = 12 selling price of 8 mangoes= 25 profit = 25–12=13 profit % = 13 x 100/12 = 13 x 25/3 = 325/3 = 108.33%
